data.title: Antonucci Law Reviews - Union NJ Personal Injury | Antonucci Law
data.meta_description: In addition to her years of advocacy for the injured and victims of discrimination, Stacey also has gained much “insider” knowledge from over 10 years of working in the defense of injury claims as trial counsel for various insurance companies. She knows the methods these companies use to avoid and delay paying legitimate claims. This knowledge has increased her passion to fight for the rights of injured victims. She successfully and aggressively handles litigation ranging from nursing home negligence to injuries sustained from accidents or employment. - Page 1
data.text:
Jose Rodriguez

Location: Roselle Park, NJ

I want to thank the Antonucci Law firm for taking care of me! I came into some legal issues and called them because I had no idea who to reach out to. Joseph answered my call. He calmed me down and really listened to me. He told me to relax and he would get back to me. As promised he followed thru with calls and emails and got my case dismissed. The level of services was above what I was expecting! This is the second time that this firm has helped me out. Both times they did not disappoint.

I have no problem recommending them and if need be I will not hesitate to call them again.

Victor Moreno

Location: Elizabeth, NJ

I'm here to share my experience with the firm . I've been a returning client for about five years now and the reason why I keep coming back is because of how professional and diligent they are. they are always there during the process and make sure they can get the best possible outcome . I want to thank Joseph McCaffrey he did a tremendous job and help me get a very good result on my case thanks again.

Kenya Gardner

Location: Irvington, NJ

STACEY , STACEY , STACEY !! . I would 10,000 percent recommend this lawyer . She is AMAZING. Stacey pays attention to your story. She makes sure you understand everything within your case and treats you like family. I never once had to call her about anything. I would never look any further for a lawyer. She is THEEEE ONEEEE. We had a deep conversation during one of our meetings and with Stacey I STAND!! SHE IS FOREVER FAMILY

Rodrell Gardner

Location: Irvington, NJ

I saw Stacey's ad while driving on Route 22. My wife immediately said "We are going with her. I can tell she's a bull. " Well my wife was absolutely right. Stacey paid complete attention to my case. She explained every detail. She made sure I knew everything step in the process. Her office staff helped me keep up with important dates. Most lawyers push smaller cases to the way side but she made sure I was fully taken care of. My case was resolved in record time. I will forever recommend Antonucci Law!!!

Heather Reid

Location: Union, NJ

So very grateful for the help and professionalism I have always receive from Stacey Salem-Antonucci law Firm.

Since, five years ago, I was involved in an automobile accident. There are times, I felt emotionally exhausted because I was insured under a complexed Automobile policy. However, that did not deter Mrs. Selem-Antonucci. With her ability to handle complex legal scenarios effectively, strategic thinking, and bold advocacy, helped me achieve a very favourable outcome. Her entire staff is always courteous and prompt in their responses, which made the whole process even more less stressful. Grateful, and thankful, Mrs. Stacey Selem-Antonucci, for your “exceptional service and results.” You have far exceeded my expectation.

Earth Air

Location: Orange, NJ

I strongly recommend using Stacy Antonucci for your personal injury case.

She will fight harder for you than anyone I have ever seen $$$$!.

She is fierce, determined and devoted to her clients

I highly recommend using Stacy Antonucci for your personal injury case.

She will fight harder for you than anyone I have ever seen $$$$!.

She is fierce, determined and dedicated to her clients.

Jazzdea Collier

Stacy Selem Antonucci was recommended to me by a friend/attorney. She helped me address some difficult and complicated questions . She did an amazing job. Although I sought Stacy out for her professional expertise, Stacy also showed a healthy dose of humanity. Something rare in her area of practice. I can not thank Stacy enough. She is a fantastic person and a great lawyer

What I like about her is that she doesn’t sugar coat things. She tells you all the things you don’t want to hear, which sucks at the time, but ultimately it helps you plan for the inevitable.

She made it real by being honest with me which ultimately made the process a lot smoother. I would recommend her to anybody and would certainly use her again.

Dan Petrosky

Stacey and her team are amazing! I have had the pleasure of knowing Stacey for over 30 years, and she has always treated me like a valued member of her family. Her commitment to her clients is unwavering, and she fights tirelessly to ensure their needs are met. Stacey's expertise in the legal field is evident in her ability to explain complex concepts in a clear and concise manner. She genuinely cares about the outcome of her clients' cases and goes above and beyond to ensure they are informed and supported throughout the process. Stacey's dedication, compassion, and expertise make her an exceptional attorney. I will continue to recommend Stacey without hesitation. Thank you, Stacey, for your unwavering commitment to your clients and for keeping me informed every step of the way!

Sincerely,

Dano

Kenyona Givens

Stacey and her team was amazing. They are understanding and kind with my personal injury. She and her staff made me feel so comfortable explaining what had with my injury. Stacey stayed in contact with me throughout the entire case and I could tell she gave her all. She worked diligently around the clock to get me exactly what I deserved. I will recommend her to everyone I know in the New Jersey area.

Alex Gomez

Location: Seaside Park NJ

I had the pleasure of working with Stacey Antonucci, from

Antonucci Law for my personal injury case and I cannot recommend them highly enough. From our initial consultation to the resolution of my case, Stacey demonstrated unparalleled professionalism, expertise and dedication. Her firm took the time to listen to my concerns, thoroughly explained the legal process, and kept me informed every step not the way. Their attention to detail and strategic approach to my case resulted in a favorable outcome beyond my expectations. I strongly recommend Stacey and her team.

Mitchell Lilien

Location: Neptune NJ

Stacey is the kind of lawyer one would hope for. Cares about her clients and gets results. Stacey and her team have also given me very valuable legal advise on a couple of occassions. Following her advise,things worked out well for me and my family.I can't thank you enough !!!!

Paul Burt

Location: Rahway, NJ

Stacey Antonucci is an amazing attorney!!! She is the type of attorney you want as your advocate. She will always go the extra mile fighting for her clients. She has aided me and family on numerous occasions, never steering us wrong. Her office staff is always helpful and accommodating. You definitely want them representing you!!!

Denise Beckerle

Location: Howell NJ

Stacey has an excellent working knowledge of the law and is committed to get the best outcome for her clients. Smart, well spoken, and dedicated, she has provided me with accurate information and given excellent guidance for a number of legal matters for me. She will get the results you are looking for!

Charise

Stacey and her team are the best! Right from the start you will know you are in great hands and Stacey really cares. There is no doubt she will fight for you and protect you. She is very dedicated and knowledgeable and went above and beyond for us!

Noelle Buchinsky

Since my first interaction with Stacey and Antonucci Law’s staff, it has been nothing but professional and attentive. They truly have the best intentions for whatever questions or concerns you feel unsure about. Stacey and her staff made my workers compensation case go so smoothly that it felt so relieving. Stacey and her staff go above and beyond every time, and I’ve never felt so safe with anyone else. I’ve already recommended so many friends and family that feel uneasy speaking to someone, but I now know I can confide in Antonucci law.
